trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex" /> property and the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex" /> property for navigation in wizard controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para as propriedades <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex" /> e <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex" /> para navegação nos controles do assistente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs> class provides the data needed for the various navigation events in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs> classe fornece os dados necessários para os diversos eventos de navegação em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs> object to indicate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick> eventos de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> controlar usa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs> objeto para indicar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A> para o controle.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> object that is currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> objeto exibido no momento no <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> controle.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> object that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control will display next.
trans-unit.target: O índice do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> que o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> exibirá em seguida.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the navigation to the next step in the wizard should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a navegação para a próxima etapa no assistente deverá ser cancelada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the navigation to the next step should be canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a navegação para a próxima etapa deve ser cancelada; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> object currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> exibido no momento no controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" />.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> object that is currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice de base zero que representa o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> objeto exibido no momento o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> object that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control will display next.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o índice do objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> que o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> exibirá em seguida.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> object that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> control will display next.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de índice de base zero que representa o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep" /> do objeto que o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard" /> controle será exibido ao lado.
